title: MindQuake
description: An alien energy catches a ride to Earth on a meteorite, only to be unleashed in a small New Mexico town. A group of unlikely friends must band together to stop a rogue spy and his henchmen as the otherworldly consciousness inhabits them, giving them unnatural powers. Going from deep in an abandoned mine to the harsh unforgiving desert, this quirky adventure follows the characters and their interwoven stories in a new and interesting way.
author: Michael Sandham
